title: The Patriots and 49ers Trade for Receivers, Draft Picks vs. Player Values, and a Packers-Chiefs Preview | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Patriots have traded for Mohamed Sanu and the 49ers have traded for Emmanuel Sanders; does this change how we feel about either team? (1:15) Plus, the three biggest matchups of the week, including Packers vs. Chiefs. We discuss whether or not Patrick Mahomes will actually play before we preview the Thursday Night Football game (30:50).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
